availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Crockett Pickett (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and laborer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and laborer. Tennessee native. Son of Daniel Pickett. Married to Emeline Dycus Pickett. Father of Sabre J. Pickett, William Pickett, John Pickett, Mary E. Pickett, and Permelia Pickett. Farmer in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 267A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 601.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 514A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 26992.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 116-60-21261.
